title: Hilaria: or The triumphant feast for the fift of August
author: Lloyd, Lodowick, fl. 1573-1610.
publisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling neere the Red Lyon, in the Cloth-Fayre,
notes: Running title reads: The tryumphant feast for the fift of August.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
